short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up professor's rating right on Acorn's course selection page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension let student to look up the instructor's rating right on Acorn's page!
The steps are really simple:
1) Highlight the instructor's name
2) Click the extension icon and select the course's department
3) Search!
